snippet.title: High Noon Drifter - v1.2 Update Trailer
snippet.description:
It says v1.2, but in this I'm showing off some new features in v1.1 too, in case some folks haven't kept up with the new releases.
I've been surprised time and time again by the reception to this little mod. I only started it as a way to figure out ZScript with just a simple Doom weapon replacement, and people have been overwhelming me with feedback about stuff they like, stuff they don't like, and more.
Thank you all for your support and your criticism. I appreciate it sincerely.

https://forum.zdoom.org/viewtopic.php?f=43&t=57098 - Forum topic.
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1hbaH0VvLaspBOsjW6faM7D-jhH7LCfiH/view?usp=sharing - Download link.
http://the-powerhouse.net/HighNoonDrifter-v1.2c.pk3 - Download mirror.

Music used: Trigun: Badlands Rumble - DICE for Life

Maps used (in order):
Templum Dormiens Dei - Map01
Hexen: Deathkings of the Dark Citadel - Map51
The Plutonia Experiment - Map20
Hellground - Map01
Pumpkin Hell - Map01
Preacher - Map01
Requiem - Map04
Unloved - Map02
Claustrophobia 1024 2: The Mystery of Too Many Maps - Map06
Harmony - Map04
Chex Quest 3 - E3M1
Scourge of Viscerus - Map02
300 Minutes of /vr/ - Map07
Slaughtenstein - Map31
Deus Vult - Map03
Heretic Treasure Chest - E2M1
Slaughterfest 2012 - Map02
Rush - Map08
Sunder - Map03
Deus Vult 2 - Map23
Hexen - Map40
Heretic - E3M8
Chex Quest 3 - E3M5
Ultimate Torment n' Torture: Supportive Edition - TNTLE
DUMP 3 - MAPFINAL
